drawing

Class ThemeCompositor

  • Object
    • ThemeCompositor

  • public class ThemeCompositor
extends Object
    Arranges which elements in a theme go where on screen. This class should be replaced with generic calls and injections from the elements themselves and from theme options, as it only contains data and a lot of repetition.
    Author:
    tony

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private TextCompositor artistText
      A text compositor to be used to render artist names
